name: Circuit
description: Circuit is an oscilloscope-themed robot who is a proud member of the WebtrES club. With its sleek design and vibrant red color inspired by the iconic rossoCorsa shade, Circuit is a classic in every sense. Its buttons, arms, and legs all have a timeless and retro feel, staying true to the traditional style of oscilloscopes. The screen, displaying waveforms and data in a classic manner, adds to its nostalgic charm. Circuit is not only a stylish and eye-catching robot but also excels in its ability to analyze and interpret electronic signals with utmost precision. As a team member of WebtrES, Circuit brings its charisma, intelligence, and wisdom to contribute to the club's endeavors.
